title: HOUR 1- Patrick Ewing Sep 01, 2020
itunes:title: HOUR 1- Patrick Ewing Sep 01, 2020
description:
Patrick Ewing tells Dan that he is trying to celebrate the life of John Thompson rather than mourn his loss. Patrick says that is was Coach Thompson that asked him to apply for the Georgetown head coaching position.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
